Author: RadekG
Title: [ICO now] SOFIN - International fiat platform for P2P loans
Body: Hello! Two categories of competitors: ‚Ä¢ Traditional P2P-Lending (Lending Club, Zopa, bezbanka.ru, etc.) ‚Ä¢ Cryptocurrency Loans (Everex, POLONIEX, Btcjam, etc.) Our system of record and transaction keeping is more open than traditional P2P. For example the Lending Club scandal regarding the company turnover was blown out of proportion. SOFIN transactions are stored in a decentralized storage facility based on blockchain. There is also an effective bonus model that is based on the private SOFIN token (elaborated in the Smart Contract Structure section). Legal purity and transparency of each transaction. The loan is given in the fiat rate in currency of the borrower, according to the law. Therefore, creditor has a clear and legitimate reason to repay his loan. In addition, we differentiate from both competitors with the existence of our own guarantee fund, which reduces the risks to creditors (elaborated in the Guarantee Fund section). We give loans to both individuals and SMEs. In terms of business, it can be both a business development loan and/or for entrepreneurial startups. The main thing is to make the project viable.

SOFIN transactions are stored in a decentralized storage facility based on blockchain. There is also a powerful bonus model based on the private SOFIN token (more in the Smart Contract Structure section). We benefit from the second category with the legal purity and transparency of each transaction. The loan is given in the fiat currency of the Borrower‚Äôs country according to the law. So the Creditor has a clear, legitimate reason to repay his loan. In addition, we differ from both options with the existence of our own guarantee fund, which reduces the risks of Creditors (more in the Guarantee Fund section). We give loans to both individuals and small and medium-sized businesses. For businessmen it can be both a business development loan and the one to start a new one. The main thing is to make the project viable. The risk assessment methodology, including the startups, has already been tested in practice. For the startups it will also be a plus if the Borrower has already proven its reliability by taking and returning consumer loans. His ranking and history of consumer loans will be available to the system, and the chances of getting credit for business will grow significantly.

Body: If you are talking about all documents needed for a platform or provided by it, here you have a list of all (or most important) of them which you can find out in our White Paper (https://goo.gl/CGpzHH):  For registration in SOFIN platform, you need to send us the following documents: 1. Passport 2. TIN - Tax Identification Number 3. IIAN - Individual insurance account number  For scoring and verification of all SOFIN clients: 1. Passport and contact information 2. Data bank of the Executive Productions 3. Verification of convictions and trials currently in progress 4. Credit rating of the Borrower in the credit ratings bureau 5. Verifying of the borrower‚Äôs payments and credit cards.  For the loan repayment there will be a bunch of documents provided by our platform to each corresponding scenario. 1. If the borrower is easily reached, a platform will provide with an additional loan contract. 2. If the borrower cannot be reached, SOFIN will provide you with a bunch of documents  For the legal design of a loan agreement: 1. A loan agreement supported by to all legal aspects and requirements 2. Our system will provide you with an electronic signature which is assigned to you at registering in our platform (after sending an agreement on the use of an analogous handwritten signature). 3. Furthermore, our platform gives a token-bonding choice (cryptocurrency) to guarantee that a loan is received. It likewise embraces the lawful outline of the promise to limit the Creditor's risks. 4. The use of the Guarantee Fund will be proposed in convenient occasions. For this situation, we will issue the platform's surety agreement.  Lastly, everything between two parties is done by an electronic workflow which is made by the preparation of the platform and the signing of the relevant documents by borrower and creditor: ‚Ä¢ Loan agreement; ‚Ä¢ Extension of a loan; ‚Ä¢ Issuance and withdrawal of bail; ‚Ä¢ A surety agreement; ‚Ä¢ Assignment of a claim under an obligation arising from a contract.  (You always can have a look at more detailed information here: https://goo.gl/CGpzHH)
